div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2300 El Djem, (anc. Thysdrus), 50 km. N (1138) of Sfax, Tunisia, 1936 Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 3000+ AR Carthage: tetradr. of Carthage mint (as SNGCop. 390-6) Disposition: London 45 Robinson, BMQ 1938, pp. 141-3, illus.; Essays Mattingly, p. 35 Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, p. 47
